To,
The HR Department
3rd Floor Plot No. D-5 
Logix Infotech Park Sector-59 
Noida, Uttar Pradesh - 201307

Re: - Confirmation of adherence to Polestar HR policy and appended terms & conditions post relieving of responsibilities
Dear Sir,
This is with reference to my below-mentioned employment details & my resignation letter sent to you on 8/7/2019: 
	Employee Name: 
	  Kulwant Singh

	Employee ID: 
	 

	Designation: 
	 

	Reporting to: 
	 

	Location: 
	  Noida


I hereby declare and confirm on following: -
· I have returned company laptop & related accessories bearing following details –
· Laptop / Desktop Model Number _______________________
· Brand Name  _______________________________
· I have cleared all advances / loans from the company -                   Yes              No        Not Availed
· I have returned Employee Identity Card                          -                  Yes              No       
· I have returned Employee Insurance Card                       -                  Yes              No
I hereby agree and confirm on following additional terms & conditions pursuant to my relieving from the company: -
1. This is to confirm that I neither have in my possession, nor have I failed to return to my supervisor/relevant company department representative, any company identification badges, passes, keys or other property or Confidential Information of the company, including, but not limited to, any confidential and proprietary documents or materials and information which relates to Polestar Clients, marketing, trade secrets, designs, processes, products, machinery, customer data and business affairs. 
2. I hereby confirm that I shall not approach or join any client of Polestar Solutions & Services India Pvt. Limited, directly or indirectly, for a period of 2 years, from my leaving date and in case I found to be so, Polestar Solutions & Services India Pvt. Ltd can take legal action against me for the breach of this contract and may also seek such amount of damage / compensation as it may deem fit at that point of time..
3. I Hereby indemnify Polestar Solutions & Services India Pvt. Ltd for any loss or damaged caused, due to omission or error, knowingly or unknowingly, and I hereby confirm that I shall be responsible for all such loss or damaged caused to Polestar Solutions & Services India Pvt. Ltd.
4. I hereby agree and confirm that I will not malign the image of the company, by any action, either through social media or digital / print media, directly or indirectly. In case you found to be involved in any of such activities, Polestar reserves the right to take criminal action for the breach of this contractual agreement and you will be liable for any loss caused or may be caused to Polestar.
My signature below confirms the above.


(Name)
Dated:

Date-10/7/2019
To
Polestar Solutions & Services India Pvt. Ltd.
D-5, Sector 59
Noida, Uttar Pradesh

As you are aware, I Kulwant Singh have tendered my resignation from the services of Polestar Solutions & Services India Pvt. Ltd. ("the Company") vide letter emailed dated 8th July 2019. As of the date of this letter, I am in possession /expected to be in possession of the confidential information acquired by me while in employment of the Company. I understand and acknowledge that any breach of obligation of confidentiality on my part will cause grave and irreparable harm and injury to the Company.
In view of the above, I declare, warrant, undertake and confirm to the Company, that with effect from today for a period of 3 years from the date of leaving i.e, I will :
· keep all the Confidential Information acquired by me during my employment with the Company in strict confidence;
· not to publish, reproduce, disclose, discuss, use or convey such Confidential Information to any new employer or any other person;
· not act, directly or indirectly, on behalf of the new employer or any of its existing or prospective clients, employees, other persons thereof in any assignment where I would be in a position to use such Confidential Information;
· return all the Confidential Information, documents, papers, manuals and such other official papers and permanently delete/erase all digital and electronic Confidential Information including the information, papers and documents that I may have at my residence or otherwise;
· notify my new employer about the contents of this letter/undertaking.

All Confidential information received by me during my tenure from the said date of joining till date of leaving shall be kept confidential upto a period of three years from the said date of leaving.
For the purposes of this letter/undertaking:
Confidential Information means any materials or property (other than personal effects) or technical data, know-how, financial data, business information, including, but not limited to, research, product plans, products, services, employee lists and salary data, client lists and clients (including, but not limited to, customers of the Company whom I called or with whom I became acquainted during the term of my employment), markets, developments, inventions, processes, technology, marketing, finances or other business information, whether in writing, visual, oral, electronic or non-tangible form, which I have accessed, acquired, received or prepared while in employment, relating to the Company, its clients (for whose matter the Company or its associates have worked on being mandated or otherwise) and their associates, and includes but not limited to  all data, records, information and materials for which the Company or its associates are bound by any confidentiality undertakings or obligations.
This undertaking is in addition to those declarations and undertakings as contained in the Employment Terms and Conditions and HR Policies.
Any dispute or controversy arising out of, relating to, or concerning any interpretation, construction, performance or breach of this Undertaking, shall be settled by arbitration to be held in Noida, India, in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The arbitrator may grant injunctions, specific performance or other relief in such dispute or controversy. The decision of the arbitrator shall be final, conclusive and binding on the parties to the arbitration. The courts of Delhi shall have exclusive jurisdiction on all matters concerned with the arbitration or the award pursuant thereto.
Signature of Kulwant Singh
